summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.1°C) and outside temperature (down 4.2°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 728 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1675 m), feels like temperature (up 7.1°C), outside temperature (up 5.8°C), and dew point temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 727.8m lower than yesterday, 694.5m lower than the past week, 1674.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 1059m and a peak of 3380m, averaging 996.5m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
